tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE route_tracking (
  route_id INT,
  departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
  distance FLOAT,
  traffic_intensity INT
);

CREATE TABLE RouteEfficiency (
    route_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    end_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    distance FLOAT NOT NULL,
    efficiency_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE TrafficPatterns (
    pattern_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id UUID NOT NULL,
    traffic_density FLOAT NOT NULL,
    average_speed FLOAT,
    congestion_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE TransportationRoutes (
    route_id INT,
    pattern_id INT,
    start_location VARCHAR(255),
    end_location VARCHAR(255),
    route_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES RouteEfficiency(route_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (pattern_id) REFERENCES TrafficPatterns(pattern_id)
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name TEXT,
  start_location TEXT,
  end_location TEXT,
  distance_km FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE route_schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  vehicle_id INT,
  departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    start_location VARCHAR(255),
    end_location VARCHAR(255),
    distance DECIMAL,
    traffic_conditions VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    capacity INT,
    driver_id INT,
    route_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES routes(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE drivers (
    driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    driver_name VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    vehicle_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT,
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES routes(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
    traffic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT,
    traffic_indicator VARCHAR(20),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES routes(route_id)
);
